### Something about the course

This is an introductory course for Open Data Science. The lectures and hands on exercises are conducted every Thurday from 8-10am at Unioninkatu 35. The course started on 19.01.2017 and we need to submit the final assignment on 10.03.2017.The course is taught by **Kimmo Vehkalahti**.
